short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draftly is a Chrome extension that helps you write emails faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your inbox with Draftly! Designed for busy professionals and anyone looking to save time, Draftly uses advanced artificial intelligence to craft personalized email responses in seconds.

Key Features:

* Quick Reply Generation: Create clear and effective drafts with a single click.
* Smart Personalization: Adjust the tone and content of replies to fit your needs.
* Intuitive Interface: Minimalist design that integrates seamlessly into your workflow.
* Time-Saving Solution: Focus on what matters most while Draftly handles your email replies.

How to Use:

1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open any email in your inbox.
3. Click the "Generate Response" button to get a ready-to-send draft.

Additional Notes:

* Compatible with Gmail and other popular email platforms.
* User data remains private and secure.
